import {} from 'react' import "./NavBar.css" import ls from "local-storage" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { push as Menu } from 'react-burger-menu'; const NavBar = (props) => { const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false) const handleStateChange = (state) => { this.setState({menuOpen: state.isOpen}) } const closeMenu = () => { this.setState({ menuOpen: false }) } const localClickHandler = (e) => { ls.set("currentUser", null) // props.logoutHandler() } return ( props.currentUser === null ? <> :
) } export default NavBar
